mutants.code:
def calculate_sum_of_squares(n):
    square_sum = 1
    i = 1
    while i * i < n:
        square_sum += i * i
        i += 1
    return square_sum

def calculate_sum_of_squares(n):
    square_sum = -1
    i = 1
    while i * i < n:
        square_sum += i * i
        i += 1
    return square_sum
